Description: Pretty Woman is a romantic comedy about a wealthy businessman who hires a charming woman to accompany him to social events, only to develop a deep connection with her. As their relationship evolves, both characters confront their pasts and discover the transformative power of love.

Clueless is a teen comedy that follows Cher Horowitz, a wealthy and popular high school student in Beverly Hills, as she navigates friendships, romance, and her own self-discovery. Through her efforts to play matchmaker and improve the lives of others, Cher learns valuable lessons about love, kindness, and self-awareness.

Seven is a dark psychological thriller about two detectives, Mills and Somerset, who hunt down a serial killer whose murders are based on the seven deadly sins. As the investigation unfolds, the killer orchestrates a chilling and twisted conclusion that forces the detectives to confront their own moral dilemmas.

The Matrix is a science fiction film that follows Neo, a hacker who discovers that reality as he knows it is a simulated illusion controlled by machines. With the help of a group of rebels, Neo must confront the machines and embrace his destiny.

Movie: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
Description: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days is a romantic comedy about Andie Anderson, a magazine writer who is assigned to write an article on how to drive a man away in 10 days. She starts dating Ben Barry, a charming ad executive who is secretly trying to make a woman fall in love with him in the same timeframe to win a high-profile campaign.
